Description: Conversion of dwellinghouse into four flats (comprising 2 no. 1-bed flats and 2 no. 2-bed flats); conversion of garage into habitable room; alterations to roof to raise ridge height; external alterations; bin & cycle store

Demolition of existing buildings and construction of a 4 storey (including basement) development comprising 4 x 3 bedroom houses; 1 x 2 bedroom and 2 x 1 bedroom units; 4 x domestic outbuildings and associated works.
Construction of a part 1/part 2-storey 2-bed end of terrace dwelling house.
Construction of a 2nd storey to provide 5 flats (4x1-bed, 1x2-bed) with associated amenity space.
Construction of an end-of-terrace single bedroom dwellinghouse.
Demolition of existing storage sheds and construction of a new ground and lower ground duplex apartment

COU from a golf driving range with ancillary golf shop and first floor flat (D2) together with two storey rear extension & external alterations to nine flats (C3); S/S detached building at side for use as replacement golf reception building; parking etc
Change of use from workshops attached to shop (Class A1) to three dwellings and retention of 50sqm shop (Class A1).
Outline consent with all matters reserved: Redevelopment to provide a two storey detached building with basement and accommodation in roof to create nine flats; basement parking
Outline Planning Permission (All Matters Reserved) for the construction of a 2-storey, 2-bed detached house.
Conversion of two self-contained flats back in to single dwelling (C3). (Summary)
Conversion of 2no self-contained flats back into single family dwelling
Change of use of premises from a A1 use to to C3 (residential use - 2 no studio flats and 1 x 1 bed flat with existing first floor flat above no. 561 to remain)
Lawful Development Certificate (Proposed)-Change of use of property from residential house (Class C3) to care home (C3b).
